column3: I enjoyed my massage here. The sitting room was quiet and peaceful. The staff was very nice and knowledgeable. I was part of the monthly subscription and was able to get an appointment easily.

column2: Georgette is the one you want.
column3: Nice clean place and a 80 min deep tissue with Georgette will change your life! Joined here since PT was not helping and this is really making a difference , very happy they came close to my home.

While visiting West Covina I developed a terrible knot in my upper back and below my neck. I could hardly move and it was very painful. While walking through the mall parking lot I saw this spa. I called to make an appointment for the next day. The therapist worked very hard to ease the knot out. What relief!

I've had several massages here and have always had great service regardless of the massage therapist who treated me. I enjoyed the quiet, softly lit rooms with the comfy massage beds and luxuriously soft blankets. The only thing I haven't liked is the strong push to pay for a membership. I can't afford to go every month, no matter how wonderful it is for me.
